title: Spoiler Specials: Suspiria
description:
This week on Spoiler Specials Dana Stevens and Sam Adams discuss Luca Guadagnino's remake of Suspiria. 
Podcast Production by Danielle Hewitt. 
This episode is brought to you by the following advertisers:
I Travel For, a new podcast that explores what inspires us to travel. Listen and subscribe today at https://apple.co/2DPEWJE.
Simple Contacts. To save $20 off your first order, go to simplecontacts.com/SPOILER and use the promo code SPOILER. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
